subject: Junit's Importance
msgSnippet: Hi I am familiar with Junit for a month or two month. I have also started to look into Cactus project for servlet testing. I am one of the very few people in
messageBody:
Hi

I am familiar with Junit for a month or two month. I have also started to
look into Cactus project for servlet testing. I am one of the very few
people in the organization to know about this & want to share Junit's
features & advantages with others & convince them of its use. I have tested
some Java programs with Junit. I gave a presentation to my managar, to see
if we can pilot the use of Junit in some project.

Can someone tell me the real advantages of using Junit over the
individual's own Unit testing of the Java Code written by him. I have been
reading the articles posted on Junit homepage. Where can I find more
articles giving the advantages of Junit.

Thanks & Regards
Arathi
